com.estimote.sdk.connection.settings.mesh

Class CloudMeshManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.estimote.sdk.connection.settings.mesh.CloudMeshManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MeshManager

    public class CloudMeshManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements MeshManager
    Class for mesh management. It allows to fetch all data about user's mesh networks. You can use Mesh object to add/remove devices from it. Bear in mind that some additional device synchronisation must be made after adding/removing it from mesh, so it might be a longer task.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.estimote.sdk.connection.settings.mesh.MeshManager

      • createMesh

        public void createMesh(java.util.List<DeviceId> devices,
                       java.lang.String meshName,
                       Device.Settings settingsToShare,
                       MeshManager.MeshCallback<Mesh> callbackForCreate)
        Creates mesh from list of given devices.
        Specified by:
        createMesh in interface MeshManager
        Parameters:
        devices - list of devices to create mesh from
        meshName - mesh name
        settingsToShare - settings to be common to all devices in this mesh. It should be settings from one chosen device.
        callbackForCreate - callback to notify when operation finishes.
